Okay, so I guess I'm going to have to be the first one to say it... Honestly, this wasn't nearly as bad as I thought. It was shitty, but in that way that you had a good time when you were watching it, whether it be from genuine laughs or "oh my god how dumb can this be" laughs. Either way: a dumb, enjoyable way to spend 90-something minutes.

I know a lot of you want to ignore the reviews and hope to death that this movie won't let you down. It will. I love Hank Azaria and the Smurfs as well. However the film is just AWFUL. Not even remotely entertaining. I couldn't watch for more than 10 minutes and it didn't keep my attention even that long. Don't bother. TRUST ME, don't bother. If you are a child of the 80's, this film will make you lose respect for Hollywood, not that it deserves much if it's gonna put out shit like this. Ruined a great childhood memory is what it did.
